files.patch:
@@ -56,8 +56,0 @@ - *

- * Since this interface must expose the contents of pixels on the - * target device or image to potentially arbitrary code, the use of - * custom objects which implement this interface when rendering directly - * to a screen device is governed by the {@code readDisplayPixels} - * {@link AWTPermission}. The permission check will occur when such - * a custom object is passed to the {@code setComposite} method - * of a {@code Graphics2D} retrieved from a {@link Component}.
